entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Beaver Island
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:55 PM ADT Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 0.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Beaver Island 01:00 AM ADT Tuesday 14 March 2023
Temperature: 0.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.9 kPa falling
Humidity: 90 %
Dewpoint: -1.2°C
Wind: ESE 16 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness before morning. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow mixed with rain. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow mixed with rain beginning in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind becoming east 30 km/h gusting to 50 early in the afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow mixed with rain. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Snow mixed with rain changing to rain near midnight and ending overnight then cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers. Fog patches overnight. Snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Rainfall amount 5 mm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60 except gusting to 80 along parts of the coast in the evening and after midnight. Wind becoming east 20 overnight. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Showers. High 6.
entry.summary: Showers. High 6. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Monday 13 March 2023
